oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. E.E. Patton letter, September 17, 1920.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from E.E. Patton, Senator Knox County, Knoxville, TN, to Mrs. L. Crozier French. September 17, 1920. Re: thank you for banquet ticket given to members of the Tennessee General Assembly who voted for the ratification of the 19th Amendment. Lizzie Crozier French Papers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women's suffrage; Tickets; Banquets; Correspondence;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: E.E. Patton
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
